name: KLM Royal Dutch Airlines
description: Flag carrier airline of the Netherlands and the world's oldest continuously operating scheduled airline still using its original name. Founded in 1919, KLM operates flights to over 170 destinations across 63 countries from its hub at Amsterdam Airport Schiphol. A member of the SkyTeam alliance and part of the Air France-KLM Group, KLM combines Dutch heritage with modern aviation services, serving millions of passengers annually with a fleet of over 100 aircraft.
